name: Francois Luchtens
desc: Web developer, passionate about computer programming and projet creation, always keen to learn new technologies. Alumni at 19 (42 Network) in Brussels.

projects.name: 42Stats
projects.desc: Web application in Java Spring Boot and Next.js for 42 users to discover detailed information and statistics retrieved from 42 API.
projects.full_desc: Web application in Java Spring Boot and Next.js for 42 users to discover detailed information and statistics retrieved from 42 API.

projects.name: Taskly
projects.desc: Web application to manage your day in Java Spring Boot and Angular. Plan your tasks to boost productivity.
projects.full_desc: Web application to manage your day in Java Spring Boot and Angular. Plan your tasks to boost productivity.

projects.name: ft_transcendence
projects.desc: Modern multiplayer pong game web application in React and NestJS. Win matches against your opponents to increase your rank.
projects.full_desc: Modern multiplayer pong game web application in React and NestJS. This is the latest project of the 42 common core, involving the creation of a full stack application with multiplayer online pong as its main objective. It includes many features such as a matchmaking system, statistics, game history, friendship system and real-time chat.

projects.name: camagru
projects.desc: Instagram-like site in PHP using MVC architecture. Import or take photos, add filters and share them!
projects.full_desc: Instagram-like site created in PHP MVC architecture and MySQL. The first project of 42 web branch, this is a complete web application whose main objective is to take photos and add filters to publish them.

projects.name: react-weather-app
projects.desc: An interactive weather application created in React and Tailwind CSS that lets you check the weather forecast in real time.
projects.full_desc: An interactive weather application created in React and Tailwind that lets you check the weather forecast in real time.

projects.name: digital-booster
projects.desc: Digital Booster landing page in Next.js, SCSS and GSAP. Integration of a design from a Figma model.
projects.full_desc: Digital Booster landing page in Next.js, SCSS and GSAP. Integration of a design from a Figma model.

projects.name: webserv
projects.desc: Basic HTTP server written from scratch in C++98 that implements POST, GET and DELETE methods and integrated CGI for dynamic pages.
projects.full_desc: Basic HTTP server written from scratch in C++98. Created during the common core of 42, it implements POST, GET and DELETE methods and integrates CGI for dynamic pages.

projects.name: cub3d
projects.desc: A simple 3D raycasting rendering in C using MiniLibX library inspired by Wolfenstein 3D.
projects.full_desc: A simple 3D raycasting rendering in C using the MiniLibX library. Produced during the common core of 42, this project was inspired by the world-famous Wolfenstein 3D game, which was the first FPS ever.
